pages.title: Creating Metals
pages.text: In order to use metals, first you must create metals.

To get started, you will need:$(li)31 Iron Ore, and$(li)4 Iron Ingots$(br2)Additionally, to perform one transmutation action:$(li)2 Iron Blocks, and$(li)2 Gold Blocks.$(br2)Thus, to create all types of metals, you will need:$(li)10 Iron Blocks, and$(li)10 Gold Blocks.

The creation process of metals focuses on the $(l:transmutation/transmutation_matrix)transmutation matrix$(). It is through this block that all magical metals are created. To create the $(l:transmutation/transmutation_matrix)transmutation matrix$(), one must first create $(l:magical_metals/starmetal)starmetal$(), obtained from iron ore.

$(l:magical_metals/orichalcum)Orichalcum$() is used as the input block to the $(l:transmutation/transmutation_matrix)transmutation matrix$(), and is converted into the new metal types by the transmutation matrix. Every transmutation operation requires two orichalcum blocks, and two 'focus' blocks, as described in $(l:transmutation/transmutation_matrix#transmutationbasics)transmutation matrix$(). Initially, these can be starmetal blocks.

The transmutation process is biome dependant, see $(l:transmutation/transmutation_matrix#transmutationbiome)this page$(). After transmuting each metal for the first time, you can then create $(l:transmutation/transmutation_anchor)transmutation anchors$() which simply the process greatly.
